definition: intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

sentences.english: After surgery you will be given intravenous fluids (IV’s) in your arm.
sentences.chinese: 手術後，你將在手臂上被給予靜脈輸液。

sentences.english: In the past, the flow of vein transfuse belonged to pure technology flow.
sentences.chinese: 過去的靜脈輸液流程是純技術流程。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the cases of the surface decline in Murphy's dropper while transfusion .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討輸液時茂菲氏滴管液麪自行下降的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss application of pulse type tube in vein infusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討脈衝式封管在靜脈留置針輸液中的應用。

sentences.english: The port is surgically inserted under the skin's surface on the upper chest wall.
sentences.chinese: 輸液港是通過手術植入胸壁上的皮膚下面。

sentences.english: Objective To standardize the management of out-patient intravenous service process.
sentences.chinese: 目的規範門急診輸液室服務流程的管理。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the absorbability of the PVC infusion sets to ciprofloxacin.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察PVC輸液袋對環丙沙星的吸附性。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the stability of pipes conveying fluid on elastic foundation.
sentences.chinese: 研究彈性地基上輸液管的穩定性。

sentences.english: Mainly for medical permeating and drying of stripe medicine such as band-aid infusion band .
sentences.chinese: 主要用於創可貼，輸液貼的藥條浸藥，烘乾。

sentences.english: Conclusion Cefpiramide sodium can be mixed with the five injections.
sentences.chinese: 結論頭孢匹胺鈉與五種常用輸液可以配伍使用。

sentences.english: Greece will move back into the headlines, since the country will need another cash infusion.
sentences.chinese: 希臘又會成爲頭條，因爲該國又需要現金輸液。

sentences.english: The manual cerebrospinal fluid storing chamber is arranged between the storing pool and the transfusing and guiding needle.
sentences.chinese: 人工腦脊液儲存室設置在貯存池與輸液導針間。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effects of precise filtering infusion apparatus on reducing the infusion reactions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討精密過濾輸液器減少輸液反應的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effects of precise filtering infusion apparatus on reducing the infusion reactions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討精密過濾輸液器減少輸液反應的效果。

sentences.english: When the infusion is done, the adjusting valve is opened and the gas through the purifier enters into the infusion bottle.
sentences.chinese: 輸液時，打開調節閥，氣體經淨化器進入輸液瓶。

sentences.english: When the infusion is done, the adjusting valve is opened and the gas through the purifier enters into the infusion bottle.
sentences.chinese: 輸液時，打開調節閥，氣體經淨化器進入輸液瓶。

definition: effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
